H0.text: Which company produces the 'Magentis' car model. Hyundai

H1.text: Which company produces the 'Magentis' car model. Toyota

H2.text: Which company produces the 'Magentis' car model. Mazda

H3.text: Which company produces the 'Magentis' car model. KIA

A4.text: The second generation Optima, known as the Kia Magentis globally except in United States and Malaysia, and as the Kia Lotze in South Korea, was launched in South Korea in November 2005.
